

### Response

```{r context="render"}
uiOutput("responseBox")
```



```{r context="server"}
output$responseBox <- renderUI({
  file = input$responses
  req(file)
  ext = tools::file_ext(file$datapath)
  cat(ext)

  htmlString = readr::read_file(file$datapath)
  cat(htmlString,"\n")
  return(HTML(htmlString))
})
```
